body_html:
'Ran out of memory' exception masked 'failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED' exception when running a large tensorflow calculation.

When running a smaller matrix operation, CUBLAS exception arises again
body_text:
'Ran out of memory' exception masked 'failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED' exception when running a large tensorflow calculation.
When running a smaller matrix operation, CUBLAS exception arises again
body:
'Ran out of memory' exception masked 'failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED' exception when running a large tensorflow calculation. 

When running a smaller matrix operation, CUBLAS exception arises again
